thread.section_title: TAXIBOX mobile self-storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TAXIBOX mobile self-storage | www.taxibox.com.au | 3 of 12
thread.title: Susie
thread.title_full: TAXIBOX mobile self-storage reviewed by Susie

author: Susie
title: Susie
text:
My experience with Taxibox was excellent and I'd like to make a special mention about their driver who did our redelivery.
Unfortunately I've forgotten his name as it was about 6 months ago.
The driver delivered our boxes on time & was very efficient. However because we had ordered on 2 different occasions & so therefore had 2 lots of taxi box's, he had delivered only 1 lot on this particular day. So immediately he rang their office to sort it out. The driver had another pick up after our redelivery & was about 40 mins away. So after our drop off he picked up the other boxes & took those back to their depot & picked up our other delivery & redelivered those to us & then waited & picked up our empty boxes. So overall it was a big round trip for him. It was a shame initially the office couldn't link my 2 orders. It would have saved their driver less grief, but he took it all in his stride (to his credit) & very professionally as well. He didn't mind going that extra mile even though it was on Saturday & he was already very busy. A job well done on his part.
Thank you for your efforts & professionalism.
